channel.title: Comments on: All-Baco Tacos: LA Unlimited Tacos Dream Team

item.title: By: Top of the Ninth: Hall of Fame Week 9 - Blaseball News Network

item.description: […] collegue Blenjamin Rees has written in-depth about Yummy in the past, you should check out his work here— but what sticks out is this quote from the All Time Tacos […]
item.content:encoded: […] collegue Blenjamin Rees has written in-depth about Yummy in the past, you should check out his work here— but what sticks out is this quote from the All Time Tacos […]

item.title: By: Stats as Shiny as Stars: Blaseball Hall of Fame Week 4 - Blaseball News Network
item.dc:creator: Stats as Shiny as Stars: Blaseball Hall of Fame Week 4 - Blaseball News Network
item.description: […] Hex struggled at first in LA, but found their groove in Season 10 as a consistent lead-off hitter who could get on base regularly (although, like most Tacos, they are an absolute nincompoop on the basepaths). This began a run of very good production, with 5 consecutive seasons of an OPS+ above 100, with the offensive-heavy environs of Season 11 Wild Low providing the best year of Hex’s career. That season, they made the most of Divisional Walk In The Park lead the League in walks with 98, good for just under one a game and 16 higher than second place, as well as an OPS+ of 135 – a brilliant season that earned Hex a place in the All-Time Tacos. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Hex struggled at first in LA, but found their groove in Season 10 as a consistent lead-off hitter who could get on base regularly (although, like most Tacos, they are an absolute nincompoop on the basepaths). This began a run of very good production, with 5 consecutive seasons of an OPS+ above 100, with the offensive-heavy environs of Season 11 Wild Low providing the best year of Hex’s career. That season, they made the most of Divisional Walk In The Park lead the League in walks with 98, good for just under one a game and 16 higher than second place, as well as an OPS+ of 135 – a brilliant season that earned Hex a place in the All-Time Tacos. […]
